title: Does payment without internet works? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes of course. Didn't we pay long before internet came into existence :). The current ones would include: Card payments at PoS / EDC terminals: lot of these terminals still function on simple telephone lines and do not use internet.  In the Indian context, bulk payment processing options like NACH /ECS does not use Internet. There are retail payment transactions enabled over SMS or USSD protocol. Some other obvious ones are cheque, cash.
